css_value: body.maxi-blocks--active #row-maxi-c5cb2197-u{box-shadow:0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-8,9,60,88),1);max-width:1170px;min-width:initial;margin-top:64px;margin-bottom:72px;padding-top:38px;padding-right:72px;padding-bottom:38px;padding-left:72px;flex-wrap:wrap;row-gap:20px;-moz-column-gap:2.5%;column-gap:2.5%;}body.maxi-blocks--active #row-maxi-c5cb2197-u > .maxi-background-displayer .maxi-background-displayer__1{width:100%;height:100%;background-color:rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-4,255,74,23),1);display:block;}@media only screen and (min-width:1921px){body.maxi-blocks--active #row-maxi-c5cb2197-u{max-width:1690px;margin-top:88px;margin-bottom:104px;padding-top:56px;padding-right:108px;padding-bottom:56px;padding-left:108px;}}@media only screen and (max-width:1366px){body.maxi-blocks--active #row-maxi-c5cb2197-u{max-width:90%;}}@media only screen and (max-width:767px){body.maxi-blocks--active #row-maxi-c5cb2197-u{margin-top:30px;margin-bottom:30px;padding-right:30px;padding-left:30px;}}
